HiddenText.Name: Do I have to have a webcam?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Do I have to have a webcam?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Yes—that is, if you want to use the video component of Skype, you do. (And really, who doesn’t want that? It’s telephone with video!) We require all of our Speaking Partners to have a functioning webcam. Most computers nowadays have webcams built-in; if yours doesn’t have one, you can purchase a webcam for a relatively low price at places like Walmart, Target, or Newegg.com.
